keyMoments.title: Young Sanji Declares Dream of Finding All Blue
keyMoments.description: As a child cook on a cruise ship, Sanji declares his dream of finding the legendary All Blue during an attack by the Cook Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: First revelation of Sanji's lifelong dream and core motivation.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going to find the All Blue!

keyMoments.title: Sanji Falls Overboard During Storm
keyMoments.description: Young Sanji is swept overboard by a massive wave during a storm, nearly drowning before Zeff rescues him.
keyMoments.significance: Critical moment that leads to Zeff's sacrifice and their bond.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Zeff's Ultimate Sacrifice
keyMoments.description: After running out of food, starving Sanji discovers that Zeff had given him all the food while keeping only treasure for himself.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the depth of Zeff's sacrifice and establishes Sanji's lifelong debt to him.

keyMoments.title: Stands Up Despite Injuries to Protect Baratie
keyMoments.description: Despite being badly beaten by Pearl, Sanji stands back up to continue fighting to protect the Baratie.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's unwavering loyalty to Zeff and the restaurant.

reveals.information: Dreams of finding the All Blue, a legendary sea where all oceans meet
Was rescued by Zeff after falling overboard during a storm; survived 47 days stranded on a rocky island
Zeff gave him all the food while starving himself, sharing Sanji's dream of finding the All Blue
Founded the Baratie restaurant with Zeff after being rescued

relationships.description: Zeff is Sanji's mentor and father figure who saved his life and shared his dream of finding the All Blue. Sanji owes Zeff a profound debt of gratitude.

evolutionMoments.description: Backstory reveals how Zeff saved young Sanji from drowning and gave him all their food during 47 days stranded on a rocky island.

keyMoments.title: Cook Pirates Attack Sanji's Ship
keyMoments.description: As captain of the Cook Pirates, Zeff attacks a cruise ship where young Sanji works as a cook.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Zeff's pirate background and how he first met Sanji under hostile circumstances.

keyMoments.title: Zeff Sacrifices His Leg to Save Sanji
keyMoments.description: Zeff dives into a stormy sea to rescue drowning Sanji, and his leg becomes caught in ship wreckage. He cuts off his own leg with a chain to free himself and save Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: Defining moment showing Zeff's selfless nature and recognition of Sanji's potential and dream.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Shared Dream of All Blue
keyMoments.description: Zeff reveals to Sanji that he also dreams of finding the All Blue, which is why he sacrificed everything to save Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the deep spiritual connection between Zeff and Sanji based on their shared impossible dream.
keyMoments.quote: I share your dream, kid. That's why I saved you - so you could find the All Blue.

keyMoments.title: Founds Baratie Restaurant with Sanji
keyMoments.description: After being rescued from the rocky island, Zeff and Sanji establish the Baratie restaurant together.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how Zeff transformed from pirate captain to restaurant owner, creating a new life with Sanji.

reveals.information: Was captain of the Cook Pirates before meeting Sanji
Lost his leg cutting it off with a chain to save himself and rescue young Sanji during a storm
Gave all the food to Sanji while starving himself for 47 days on a rocky island
Shares Sanji's dream of finding the All Blue
Founded the Baratie restaurant with Sanji after being rescued

relationships.description: Zeff is Sanji's mentor and surrogate father, having saved his life and raised him with the shared dream of finding the All Blue.

evolutionMoments.description: Backstory reveals Zeff's ultimate sacrifice to save young Sanji and ensure his survival, establishing their father-son bond.

keyMoments.title: Pearl's Fighting Techniques Debut
keyMoments.description: Pearl demonstrates his shield-based fighting style including Pearl Present (shield punch) and Pearl Close (crushing opponent between shields).
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Pearl as a formidable shield-fighter and current opponent for Sanji.

abilities.description: Pearl's standard punch using the pearls embedded in his hand shields for devastating impact.
Pearl slams his left and right shields together on either side of an opponent's head, crushing it like cymbals.
Ultra Natural Pearl Present - a more powerful version of Pearl Present with increased force.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Ono Debut
keyMoments.description: Enraged by the Krieg Pirates' actions, Luffy unleashes Gomu Gomu no Ono, stretching his leg high and bringing it crashing down to destroy the entire port-side fin of the Baratie.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of one of Luffy's signature axe-kick techniques.

abilities.description: Luffy stretches one leg high into the air, then brings it crashing down with devastating force, strong enough to destroy large structures.

keyMoments.title: Holds Zeff Hostage
keyMoments.description: Gin holds Zeff at gunpoint, preventing Sanji from effectively fighting Pearl by threatening to shoot Zeff if Sanji dodges attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the tactical disadvantage that allows Pearl to beat Sanji.
